headline: Is Dollar General’s Same-Day Delivery Push Reshaping the Digital Convenience Narrative For DG?
summary: Dollar General recently expanded its myDG Delivery same-day service to more than 17,000 stores nationwide, accessible via its app and website, and is promoting it with a limited-time free-delivery offer. By pairing in-house delivery with DoorDash and Uber Eats partnerships, the retailer is pushing deeper into rural e-commerce and strengthening its omnichannel reach. Next, we’ll examine how this same-day delivery expansion shapes Dollar General’s investment narrative around digital...

headline: Amazon Grocery Push Seen Gaining Momentum. What That Means For Instacart, DoorDash.
summary: Amazon is seeing strong growth in perishable goods sales after revamping its grocery offering late last year, a Morgan Stanley analyst said.  Amazon stock rose Friday.  Morgan Stanley analyst Brian Nowak said third-party data from research firm Numerator showed Amazon's meat and perishable sales doubled year-over-year during some weeks in the second half of 2025, compared with single-digit percentage growth in the first half of the year.
